price: Daawuudiifi Suleeymaaniinis ‘yeroo isaan lamaan lafa qonnaa (oyruu) re’oonni ummataa (halkan) dheedan keessatti murtii kennan” [yaadadhu], Nuti murtii isaanii ni beekna turre.
arabic: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wadāwūda wasulaymāna idh yaḥkumāni fī al-ḥarthi idh nafashat fīhi ghanamu al-qawmi wakunnā liḥuk'mihim shāhidīna
